front.title: Extensions to DS-Lite for Multicast Deployment

abstract.t: DS-Lite enables broadband service providers to provide IPv4 unicast service following IPv4 exhaustion by combining two mechanisms: NAT (for IPv4 address sharing) and IPv4-in-IPv6 tunnel(a bridging link, for carrying IPv4 traffic). Meanwhile, native IPv6 services, both unicast and multicast can be provided. This document describes extensions to DS-Lite to support IPv4 multicast.
